ca.mcgill.ecse211.odometer

Class OdometryCorrection

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.odometer.OdometryCorrection

  • public class OdometryCorrection
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is for odometer correction with two light sensors at the back of the robot.
    Author:
    Michel Abdel Nour

    • Constructor Detail

      • OdometryCorrection

        public OdometryCorrection(Odometer odometer,
                  EV3LargeRegulatedMotor leftMotor,
                  EV3LargeRegulatedMotor rightMotor,
                  LightSensorController leftLightSensor,
                  LightSensorController rightLightSensor)
        Construction of the odometryCorrection class
        Parameters:
        odometer - - odometer of the robot (singleton)
        rightLightSensor - - right front light sensor that is used
        leftLightSensor - - left back light sensor that is used
        rightLightSensor - - right back light sensor that is used
        leftMotor - - left motor that is used
        rightMotor - - right motor that is used

      • convertAngle

        public static int convertAngle(double radius,
               double width,
               double angle)
        This method allows the conversion of a angle to the total rotation of each wheel need to cover that distance.
        Parameters:
        radius - radius of wheel
        width - track of robot
        angle - angle desired to turn the robot by
        Returns:
        the angle the robot needs to turn each wheel to rotate
